summary: Highly experienced team and programme manager with focus on intercultural team leadership and coordination, project development and management, government policy administration, funds and financial grant management and proposal writing. Has a long track record in managing projects from start to finish in different fields such as institutional partnerships in education, capacity development of vocational traing and professional education in Food and Nutrition security and climate adaptation. A proven coach and programme manager with the ability to connect to people at all levels with different national backgrounds, while still achieving results by motivating and engaging others. Passionate about creating a good working environment that enables individuals to grow in international and cross-cultural relationships.

profile_positions.title: Regional Team Manager East and Southern Africa

profile_positions.description:
•	Contributed to the development of assessment tools and monitoring and evaluation instruments for the Erasmus Plus modality Learning Mobility of Individuals and the Tailor Made Training modality of the Netherlands Fellowships Programme. 
•	Carried out assessments of more than 50 Erasmus Plus applications submitted by Dutch Higher Education Institutions for different regions (North America, Latin America, Industrialised Asia, and Eastern Europe) on criteria such as quality of presented international strategies, cooperation arrangements, design and plan of mobility programmes, impact and dissemination of student and staff exchange programmes.
•	Carried out assessments of more than 20 TMT project proposals and facilitated monitoring and evaluation of TMTs in Central and East Africa.
profile_positions.title: Assessor Erasmus Plus and Tailor Made Training Programmes

profile_positions.description:
MHO, NPT and NICHE capacity building programme (2003-date)
•	Member of a team responsible for the administration and implementation of the NPT and NICHE programme. These are programmes for South-North cooperation which help developing countries to strengthen their institutional capacity for providing post-secondary education and training.
•	Responsible for the identification, formulation, tendering, administration and monitoring of the NPT and NICHE project portfolio in Mozambique, Zambia and currently Uganda, Vietnam and South Sudan  (project funds: between 5 - 15 Million Euro for each country), organised and managed stakeholder meetings for vocational training, higher education and centres for higher learning and science together with local authorities, arranged and facilitated external country evaluations 
•	Assessed capacity building needs, organised stakeholder meetings, developed project outlines and took part in tender evaluation for the NICHE projects supporting e.g. integrated water management, climate change adaptation and mitigation, sustainable use of natural resources, water sanitation and hygiene 
•	Implemented identification, articulation, monitoring and evaluation missions to several African countries (South Africa, Zambia, Mozambique, Uganda and South Sudan) and Vietnam leading to relevant networks with Netherlands Embassy, foreign donors, government officials, educational institutions, universities and civic groups.
•	Currently responsible for the administration and monitoring of academic capacity building projects in water management, agriculture and climate change adaptation in Vietnam (4 projects, 10 Million Euro)
•	Organized workshops and seminars for project implementers (mostly academics) on knowledge sharing and relevance of academic programmes for the labour market
•	Contributed to development and revision of organisation, procedures and monitoring tools of the NPT and NICHE programme
profile_positions.title: Project portfolio manager

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for intake, assessment, monitoring and evaluation of tailor-made trainings, Master and PhD courses contributing to capacity building of individuals and their organisations in developing countries
• Carrying out monitoring visits to students and suppliers of tailor-made training courses 
• Monitored tailor-made trainings in aerial space studies of natural resources, and urban and rural planning with emphasis on water sanitation and hygiene.
profile_positions.title: Programme officer Netherlands Fellowships Programme

profile_positions.description:
(2000)
• Research in administrative regulations for foreign scientists and students regarding immigration and visa application procedures
• Liaison between government departments and higher educational institutions to increase mobility of foreign students and scientists coming to the Netherlands.
• Organising courses, seminars and events on Dutch immigration laws and application procedures for Higher Education Institutions in the Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Policy officer, Mobility issues
